document_data.name: North Quarter
document_data.mainbody: The '''North Quarter''' was one of the four quarters of [[Huzuz]], the City of Delights, in [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}<ref name="CoD.M>
document_data.Description: The North Quarter encompassed the [[Craft District]], [[Central District]], and the [[Warehouse District of Huzuz|Warehouse District]], forming most of the northern portion of the city. Visitors often came to the North Quarter for its wide selection of skilled craftsmen. Many traders and prominent merchant families either stored or manufactured their goods here until they were ready for sale in the [[Grand Bazaar]] of the [[Clothiers' Quarter]]. Additionally, the bulk of Huzuz's military was quartered within the North Quarter.
